hotels.title: Dubrovnik Beachfront Paradise with Three Pools and Stunning Views of the Adriatic Coast
hotels.description: Escape to Sun Gardens Dubrovnik for an idyllic beachfront vacation with the sparkling waters of the Adriatic Sea your exquisite backdrop, and all of the charms of ancient Dubrovnik within easy reach. This slice of paradise is part of The Leading Hotels of the World, and boasts an abundance of entertainment options including poolside shows and beach events. You'll have a choice of amazing restaurants serving delectable Dalmation dishes, and access to three outdoor pools and an onsite spa.

hotels.title: Heritage Five-Star Dubrovnik Boutique Break with Daily À La Carte Breakfast
hotels.description: Explore the history, culture and natural beauty of Croatia with a stay at Hotel Kazbek, a former 16th-century summer palace lovingly restored into a sophisticated five-star boutique hotel. Perched on the coastline of Gruz Bay, sitting just a 10-minute drive from Dubrovnik’s Old Town, this sumptuous sanctuary is a jewel in the town’s crown, with walled gardens and heritage stone buildings offering the ultimate in privacy and peace. Spend sun-soaked days by the outdoor pool and jacuzzi or settle in for a long lunch at the restaurant, soaking up summer rays in the courtyard. Take to the sea on the hotel’s private speedboat (charges apply), exploring the Lapad Peninsula and visiting nearby islands, or stay on land to explore the vast history of Dubrovnik’s Old Town. At the end of each day, refined rooms form the perfect refuge for relaxation, with elegant detailing and modern amenities. **Luxury Escapes inclusions (select nights only):** - Enjoy delicious **daily breakfast** at the restaurant - Start the stay with a **gourmet welcome gift** - Toast your stay with a **bottle of wine on arrival** (for stays of 3+ nights) - Sample the rich flavours of Croatian cuisine with **dinner for two at the restaurant**, once per stay (for stays of 4+ nights) **Suite Upgrade:** For more space, opt for the Suite, complete with a separate living area and large bedroom.
